meanings.definition: A small metal or plastic plate attached to the heel of a shoe to protect it and provide traction.
meanings.sent1: I added heelplates to my shoes to prevent slipping on icy sidewalks.
meanings.sent2: The cobbler recommended installing heelplates to extend the life of my favorite boots.
meanings.sent3: When the heelplates clanked loudly on the marble floor, everyone turned to look.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was like heelplates, always keeping her steady on her path.
meanings.sent5: The shiny heelplates gleamed in the sunlight, catching everyone's eye.

meanings.definition: The part of a shoe that covers and supports the heel of the foot.
meanings.sent1: The heelplates of the sneakers were cushioned for extra comfort.
meanings.sent2: She felt the heelplates of her new shoes hug her feet snugly.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous puppy chewed on the heelplates of all the family's shoes.
meanings.sent4: His loyalty was the heelplates of the team, always there to support and protect.
meanings.sent5: The heelplates of the boots were so worn that they no longer provided proper support.
